name: Creative Glance Technologies
overview:
Creative Glance Technologies is globally accepted leading Website Design Company for eCommerce website development and open source customization. We have clear vision providing cost effective web solutions as per your requirement. We have strong development team of skilled and experienced website designers and developers. Creative Glance is committed with their client’s success so the talented staff of our company provides individual attention and flexibility to clients. Our team member ensures that, we deliver projects with best quality and all our client will surely satisfy with us.

We provide following services: 1) Website Design and Development 2) Open Source Customization 3) PSD to Magento Theme Design 4) PSD to Wordpress Integration 5) Ecommerce Customization 6) CMS Based Open Source Integration 7) Search Engine Optimization

We have done a lots of project and websites designing work in our last 7 years of journey. You can review our portfolio at http://www.creativeglance.com.
